about_the_game:
Become a DJ! Learn to DJ on official Pioneer DJ equipment. Join the daily workshops. Connect with our community. Level up your skills. Perform to the world.

Get a lifetime subscription of Tribe. Pay once and get it forever!
- Play on official Pioneer DJ equipment
- Use your own music - uploaded directly or via Dropbox
- Access 100 free tracks from Monstercat
- Access millions of tracks with Soundcloud Go+
- Level up your skills with game mode tutorials
- Join daily workshops with our pro mentors
- Customize your visuals with videos and animated cameras
- Livestream to Twitch directly from your headset
- Party with weekly events in the metaverse
- Join multiplayer rooms and jam together
- Play in mixed reality with passthrough

Join us on Discord |
Start your DJ journey today!

***Please be aware: WINDOWS 10 or 11 is REQUIRED to run Tribe.***

name: Tribe XR - Lifetime Subscription

subs.option_text: Tribe XR - Tribe Lifetime Subscription - $199.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) or better
  • Storage: 1100 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Standing or Room Scale
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5- 4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • Storage: 1100 MB available space

short_description: Become a DJ! Learn to DJ on official Pioneer DJ equipment. Join the daily workshops. Connect with our community. Level up your skills. Perform to the world. Get a lifetime subscription of Tribe. Pay once and get it forever! Join us on Discord | discord.gg/tribexr
